mapper.select: select attend_id,attend_name,am_punch_in_time,am_punch_in_start, am_punch_in_end, noon_punch_out_time,noon_punch_in_time,pm_punch_out_time ,pm_punch_out_start,pm_punch_out_end,work_day from tbl_#{wid}_attend_rule where status=1

select r.attend_id,r.attend_name,r.job_id,r.am_punch_in_time,r.am_punch_in_start,r.am_punch_in_end,r.pm_punch_out_time,r.pm_punch_out_start, r.pm_punch_out_end,r.work_day,j.status from tbl_#{wid}_attend_rule r right join tbl_#{wid}_attend_job j on r.job_id = j.job_id where r.attend_id=#{attend_id}

SELECT r.record_id,p.person_name,d.device_name,r.record_time,r.recog_type,g.group_name FROM tbl_#{wid}_person p RIGHT JOIN tbl_#{wid}_record r ON p.person_id=r.person_id LEFT JOIN tbl_#{wid}_device d ON r.device_id=d.device_id left join tbl_#{wid}_group_person gp on gp.person_id=p.person_id left join tbl_#{wid}_group g on gp.group_id = g.group_id where DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%Y-%m-%d')<#{date_end} AND DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%Y-%m-%d')>#{date_start} AND ((DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%H:%i')<#{am_time_end} AND DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%H:%i')>#{am_time_start}) OR (DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%H:%i')<#{pm_time_end} AND DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%H:%i')>#{pm_time_start}) )
and gp.group_id=#{group_id}
and POSITION(#{keyword} IN p.person_name) OR POSITION(#{keyword} IN d.device_name)
order by r.record_time desc
